title: How to Get the Best Ever Ending on Grow Island

steps.headline: Click the steering wheel.
steps.description: A circle should appear with a steering wheel on it.

steps.headline: Click the Pickax.
steps.description: A guy should appear and carve a circle from the ground.

steps.headline: Click the computer chip.
steps.description: A giant computer should pop up. Next, a house should appear and a lady should walk out of it.

steps.headline: Click the battery.
steps.description: The man should see the woman, jump over to her house, and get an idea. He should then cut out a chunk of the dam holding up all the water and water should flow, allowing flowers to grow. He picks some flowers and give them to the lady. The lady says "...." Next, she takes it and they go inside. The house levels up twice, and the giant computer turns into three servers.

steps.headline: Click the Screw.
steps.description: The guy should come out with his wife, revealing that  they had a child. He cuts down some trees.

steps.headline: Click the candle.
steps.description: The guy should turn dark, and a UFO should pop up, turn him into an alien, and change their house. Notice that now, instead of "Level Up", it says "UFO Up".

steps.headline: Click the smokestack.
steps.description: Everything will turn green and the whole island will explode; you just have to watch.

text: Click the steering wheel. A circle should appear with a steering wheel on it. Click the Pickax. A guy should appear and carve a circle from the ground. Click the logs. The logs should appear. Click the computer chip. A giant computer should pop up. Next, a house should appear and a lady should walk out of it. Click the battery. The man should see the woman, jump over to her house, and get an idea. He should then cut out a chunk of the dam holding up all the water and water should flow, allowing flowers to grow. He picks some flowers and give them to the lady. The lady says "...." Next, she takes it and they go inside. The house levels up twice, and the giant computer turns into three servers. Click the Screw. The guy should come out with his wife, revealing that  they had a child. He cuts down some trees. Click the candle. The guy should turn dark, and a UFO should pop up, turn him into an alien, and change their house. Notice that now, instead of "Level Up", it says "UFO Up". Click the smokestack. Everything will turn green and the whole island will explode; you just have to watch.
